text: Kombat Armouring is a Russian armoured vehicle and car manufacturer. The first prototype was called the Laura. The company's slogan is Protection without Compromise. ==History== The Laura was followed by the Ohta minivan in 1987. In 1990, Kombat Armouring acquired a military factory in Saint Petersburg, where it still produces vehicles today. From 1993 onwards, Kombat Armouring has been producing armoured vehicles for local courier services. From 1995–1998 they produced the Laura 3 which was based on the Pontiac Fiero. ==Models== T-98 Kombat *Laura (1985) *Ohto (1987) *Luaz-Proto (1988) *Kamas (1989) *Pilot (1990) *Laura 3 (1995) *Kanonir (1998) *Cornet *Gelendvagen *Combat T-98 (2005) still current ==References== ==See also== * Dartz ==External links== * Armoring Group official page Category:Truck manufacturers of Russia Category:Defence companies of Russia Category:Manufacturing companies based in Saint Petersburg Category:Vehicle manufacturing companies established in 1985 Category:1985 establishments in the Soviet Union Category:Russian brands
title: Kombat Armouring
